title: Attempted Murder Suspect Arrested
body:
***UPDATE***Khayn Leroy Hudson was captured by the Prince George's County Police Department on April 3, 2012, in Temple Hills, Maryland.Callers wishing to remain anonymous may call Crime Solvers at 1-866-411 TIPS (8477), text “PGPD plus your message” to CRIMES (274637) on your cell phone or go to  and submit a tip online.
Posted by


Prince George's County Police


at
